forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 59. North northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, a subtle hush fills the air. The sky, brushed with soft clouds, hints at a partly cloudy night, allowing the cool breeze to whisper through the city. With temperatures dipping to a crisp 46 degrees, the west northwest wind dances gently at around 7 mph, urging those out and about to perhaps grab a light jacket. In the quieted streets, the city seems to breathe a sigh of relief, seemingly inviting evening strollers to breathe in the freshness. 

Tomorrow promises a delightful shift, the sun casting a warm glow as the day awakens to mostly sunny skies, beckoning those who thrive on outdoor activities. The anticipated high of 59 degrees will embrace pedestrians and commuters alike, while a light north northwest breeze encourages leisurely strolls along the waterfront or through the vibrant parks. It’s a day tailored for quiet reflection, perhaps accompanied by a warm cup of coffee al fresco, as local artisans display their crafts. Plan your layers wisely to navigate the coolness of the morning, keeping in mind the warmth that the sun will bring, coaxing everyone into a state of relaxed contentment as it climbs overhead.
